hibernate-mapping.query: select new commitdto( c.Id, c.Acctno, c.LNo, c.M1, c.M2, c.M3, c.M4, c.M5, c.M6, c.M7, c.M8, c.M9, c.M10, c.M11, c.M12, c.P1Status, c.P2Status, c.P3Status, c.P4Status, c.LastDate, c.LastInt, c.UserNo, c.ACSign, c.CloseDate, c.Budget, c.TODCloseDate, c.UId, c.SourceBr, c.Cur, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from MNMORM00011 as c where c.Active = true and c.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode

update MNMORM00011 commit set commit.M1=:month, commit.M2=:month, commit.M3=:month, commit.M4=:month, commit.M5=:month, commit.M6=:month, commit.M7=:month, commit.M8=:month, commit.M9=:month, commit.M10=:month, commit.M11=:month, commit.M12=:month, commit.Budget=:budget, commit.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, commit.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where commit.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and commit.Active = true

select new commitdto( c.Id, c.Acctno, c.LNo, c.M1, c.M2, c.M3, c.M4, c.M5, c.M6, c.M7, c.M8, c.M9, c.M10, c.M11, c.M12, c.P1Status, c.P2Status, c.P3Status, c.P4Status, c.LastDate, c.LastInt, c.UserNo, c.ACSign, c.CloseDate, c.Budget, c.TODCloseDate, c.UId, c.SourceBr, c.Cur, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from MNMORM00011 as c where c.Acctno = :accountNo and c.Active = true

select new commitdto( c.Id, c.Acctno, c.LNo, c.M1, c.M2, c.M3, c.M4, c.M5, c.M6, c.M7, c.M8, c.M9, c.M10, c.M11, c.M12, c.P1Status, c.P2Status, c.P3Status, c.P4Status, c.LastDate, c.LastInt, c.UserNo, c.ACSign, c.CloseDate, c.Budget, c.TODCloseDate, c.UId, c.SourceBr, c.Cur, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from MNMORM00011 as c where c.LNo = :loanNo and c.Active = true and (c.CloseDate = null or c.CloseDate = '')

select new commitdto( c.Id, c.Acctno, c.LNo, c.M1, c.M2, c.M3, c.M4, c.M5, c.M6, c.M7, c.M8, c.M9, c.M10, c.M11, c.M12, c.P1Status, c.P2Status, c.P3Status, c.P4Status, c.LastDate, c.LastInt, c.UserNo, c.ACSign, c.CloseDate, c.Budget, c.TODCloseDate, c.UId, c.SourceBr, c.Cur, c.Active, c.TS, c.CreatedDate, c.CreatedUserId, c.UpdatedDate, c.UpdatedUserId ) from MNMORM00011 as c where c.LNo = :loanNo and c.SourceBr = :sourceBr and c.Active = true and (c.CloseDate = null or c.CloseDate = '')
